name: Q*bert
description:
Q*bert's pyramids and whimsical characters guarantee hours of fun! It is complete entertainment with all the color graphics and sounds of a true arcade game.

It's up to you to guide Q*bert as he leaps from cube to cube to escape his enemies and reach an even more difficult pyramid.

You must make Q*bert touch every cube. When he does, the cube changes its color. Hop Q*bert up and down steps, and help him avoid those troublemakers, sly Sam and the poisonous Coily snake. Q*bert can jump out of danger, or soar to safety on a flying disc. But be careful! Q*bert won't survive if he falls off.

The screen's colors change and evolve as you reach more difficult levels. Q*bert's colorful characters, sound and beautiful graphics make this arcade winner the perfect adventure game for youngsters and oldsters alike.
